document_data.name: Arkanon Nalander
document_data.mainbody: Lord '''Arkanon Nalander''' was a nobleman of [[Cormyr]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: His son was [[Arkeld Nalander]]. One of his bullyblades was called [[Clarn]].
document_data.History: In the wake of the massacre at the [[Council of the Dragon]], Arkanon Nalander extended an invitation to [[Arclath Delcastle]] to join him, alone, at his home for a meeting. Arclath was sure that treason would be plotted at the meeting.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Per Arclath Delcastle, the man had a number of [[Sembian]] backers. He also anticipated he'd become a foe by not attending.
